name: Solis
storyline:
As a drifting scrap dealer, you come across an abandoned ship that seems suspiciously silent. What could have happened? You decide to dock your ship.

"It was a pretty normal day for me, riding in the outer rim, as always. Not many prizes though, I was pretty close from getting back home. And then I saw this ship, right there, standing still and undamaged. No signal, no radio feedback, scan's returning nothing. I could have passed, but I'm a curious one"
summary: A short 15 to 25 minute sci-fi horror game.
